Name: Aji Amarillo BBQ Sauce
Description: Our Aji Amarillo BBQ Sauce is a  Sweet Smokey BBQ Sauce with a nice little kick thanks to our Aji Amarillo Hot Peppers grown on our own Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Tomato Sauce, Brown Sugar, Molasses, Apple Cider Vinegar, Water, Aji Amarillo Pepper, Spices (Mustard, Paprika, Garlic, Salt, Black Pepper)

Name: Smokey Mango BBQ Sauce
Description: Our Smokey Mango BBQ Sauce is a  Sweet Spicy Smokey BBQ Sauce with Mango and Peach. Its smokey Aji Mango peppers pair wonderfully with the Peach and Mango fruit. And this one has a pretty serious kick!! Ingredients: Tomato Sauce, Brown Sugar, Molasses, Apple Cider Vinegar, Water, Aji Mango Pepper, Mango, Peach, Spices (Mustard, Paprika, Garlic, Salt, Black Pepper)

Name: Jabba da Hutt Hot Sauce
Description: Our Jabba da Hutt Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Fruity, Slightly Sweet Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a nice kick. The Jabba da Hutt pepper is another creation from Jack Skaggs, this beauty is a cross between a Fatalii and a Trinidad Scorpion. Our sauce is made with all fresh picked Jabba da Hutt peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Jabba da Hutt  Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Sugar Rush Hot Sauce
Description: Our Sugar Rush Hot Sauce is a Sweet, Tangy Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a gentle kick. It is made with all fresh picked Sugar Rush peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Sugar Rush Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Paprika, Salt

Name: Devils Tongue Hot Sauce
Description: Our Devil’s Tongue Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Fruity, Slightly Sweet Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a extreme kick. It is made with all fresh picked Devil’s Tongue peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Devil’s Tongue  Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Dorset Naga Hot Sauce
Description: Our Dorset Naga Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Fruity, Slightly Sweet Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a wonderful kick. It is made with all fresh picked Dorset Naga Orange peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Dorset Naga Orange  Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Bahamian Goat Hot Sauce
Description: Our Bahamian Goat Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Fruity, Slightly Sweet Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a nice kick. It is made with all fresh picked Bahamian Goat peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Bahamian Goat Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Green Reaper Hot Sauce
Description: Our Green Reaper Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Fruity, Slightly Sweet Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a nice kick. It is made with all fresh picked Carolina Reaper peppers picked green from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Reaper Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Smokey Bahamian Beast Hot Sauce
Description: Our Smokey Bahamian Beast Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Smokey, Slightly Sweet Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a serious kick. It is made with Bahamian Beast peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Bahamian Beast Hot Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Cumin, Salt, Paprika.

Name: Jigsaw Hot Sauce
Description: Our Jigsaw Hot Sauce is a Super Hot Smokey, Tangy,  Hot Sauce with a serious kick. It’s made with all fresh ‘Gourmet Fatalii Jigsaw’ Peppers from our own Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Jigsaw  Peppers, Onion, Bell Pepper, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin,  Smoked Paprika, Salt

Name: Island Ghost Hot Sauce
Description: Our Island Ghost Hot Sauce is a Sweet, Fruity Hot Sauce with a serious kick and a great Island flavor. It’s made with ‘Ghost’ Peppers from our own Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Ghost  Peppers, Pineapple, Mango, Onion, Bell Pepper, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin,  Paprika, Salt, Citric Acid.

Name: Faces XX Hot Sauce
Description: Our Faces XX Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Fruity, Slightly Sweet Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a nice kick. It is made with all fresh picked Faces XX peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Faces XX  Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Devil's Nagabrain Hot Sauce

Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Devil's Nagabrain Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Red Reaper Hot Sauce
Description: Our Red Reaper Hot Sauce is a Tangy, Slightly Sweet, Super Hot- Hot Sauce with an amazing flavor and a extreme kick. It is made with all fresh picked Carolina Reaper peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Reaper Hot Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Cumin, Salt, Paprika.

Name: Dragon's Breath Hot Sauce
Description: Our Dragon's Breath Hot Sauce is a searing taste explosion with lots of heat. Our hottest pepper by far, with a flavor that matches. It is made with all fresh picked Dragon's Breath peppers from our Pepper Farm here in Tacoma WA. Ingredients: Water, Apple Cider Vinegar, White Vinegar, Dragon's Breath Peppers, Bell Pepper, Onion, Garlic, Lime Juice, Cumin, Salt

Name: Sugar Rush Salsa
Description: Sugar Rush is a sweet mild Salsa with loads of amazing flavor. Ingredients: Tomatoes, Bell Pepper, Onion, Tomato Sauce, Pineapple, Peach, Sugar Rush Hot Peppers, Garlic, Cumin, Black Pepper, Salt, Citric Acid.

Name: Peach Ghost Scorpion Salsa
Description: Sugar Rush is a sweet mild Salsa with loads of amazing flavor. Ingredients: Tomatoes, Bell Pepper, Onion, Tomato Sauce, Mango, Peach, Peach Ghost Scorpion Hot Peppers, Garlic, Cumin, Black Pepper, Salt, Citric Acid.

Name: Carolina Reaper Salsa
Description: Carolina Reaper Salsa is an extra-spicy Salsa with amazing flavor. Ingredients: Tomatoes, Bell Pepper, Onion, Tomato Sauce, Carolina Reaper Hot Peppers, Garlic, Cumin, Black Pepper, Salt, Citric Acid.

Name: Hot Sauce Gift Box
